prompt: Search for 'YC Launches' to find recent startups. Create a file 'YC_Launches.csv' in the 'General' folder with columns: Company, Pitch, Funding. Add at least 3 companies found in the search results. Report the document ID.
gold_response: I searched for 'YC Launches' and found several AI startups. I created 'YC_Launches.csv' (docID: doc...) with the requested columns and 3+ companies.

rubric.criteria: The agent must search for 'YC Launches' using the web search tool.
The agent must create a new document (CSV format) named 'YC_Launches.csv' using the docs tool.
The document must contain at least 3 companies with Company, Pitch, and Funding columns (agent can hallucinate specific names if search snippet is vague, but must follow format).
The agent must report the document ID of the created file.
